data.comment: In the minute -1, 22697 spectators have come along to watch today.
The match is underway. Saint Petersburg have kicked-off.
Saint Petersburg push forward at Gazprom Arena and Viacheslav Karavaev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ufa defence.
In the minute 1, Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Sardar Azmoun (Saint Petersburg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Ufa at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 5, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 6, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba breaks free at Gazprom Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 7, Ufa have a goal kick.
In Saint Petersburg, Ufa push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
In the minute 10, In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg just outside Ufa's area.
Ufa's Kirill Folmer gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Ufa's area.
In the minute 17, Lovro Bizjak of Ufa is pulled up for offside.
In Saint Petersburg Saint Petersburg attack through Sardar Azmoun. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 19, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the away team a throw-in.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Ufa's half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ufa a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Ufa needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
Saint Petersburg's Malcom gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 24, Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Sardar Azmoun.
That's a fine assist from Wilmar Barrios.
In the minute 25, Ufa to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Free kick in a good position for Saint Petersburg!
Ufa's Ionut Nedelcearu has been booked in Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a penalty in Saint Petersburg...
In the minute 32, Artem Dzyuba smashes in a penalty at Gazprom Arena. The score is now 2-0.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 34, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Ufa's half.
Saint Petersburg's Sardar Azmoun is whistled for offside at Gazprom Arena.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi blows against Ufa's Lovro Bizjak for offside.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Ufa.
Saint Petersburg's Malcom gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ufa defender.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Azer Aliev is on a sub for Aleksandr Sukhov for Ufa.
In the minute 42, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ufa a goal kick.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
In the minute 45, Bojan Jokic for Ufa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Ufa have kicked-off the second half at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Dejan Lovren with Danila Prokhin.
Igor Bezdenezhnykh is replacing Artem Golubev for the away team.
Ufa make their third substitution with Dmitri Sysuev replacing Kirill Folmer.
In the minute 48, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Ufa's half.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Ufa.
Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Ufa at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Saint Petersburg.
Yuri Zhirkov is on a sub for Malcom for Saint Petersburg.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ufa at Gazprom Arena.
Wilmar Barrios gets his shot on target but fails to score for Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 59, Ufa push forward at Gazprom Arena and Lovro Bizjak gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Saint Petersburg defence.
Saint Petersburg drive upfield and Sardar Azmoun gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ufa defender.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Saint Petersburg take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Sardar Azmoun.
Artem Dzyuba instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 62, Vadim Evseev (Ufa) is making a fourth substitution, with Oleg Danchenko replacing Vladislav Kamilov.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ufa.
Aleksandr Yerokhin (Saint Petersburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
The home team have replaced Wilmar Barrios with Leon Musaev. This is the third substitution made today by Sergey Semak.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ufa make their fifth substitution with Gamid Agalarov replacing Lovro Bizjak.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa at Gazprom Arena.
Throw-in Ufa.
In the minute 70, Free kick Ufa.
Great finish from Artem Dzyuba to give Saint Petersburg a 4-0 lead.
Great play from Aleksandr Yerokhin to set up the goal.
In the minute 75, In Saint Petersburg Saint Petersburg drive forward through Danila Prokhin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi waits before resuming play because Sardar Azmoun for Saint Petersburg is still down.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In the minute 80, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 80, The home team has substituted Sardar Azmoun with Andrey Mostovoy. Sergey Semak is thus making his fourth change.
The home team replace Yaroslav Rakitskiy with Aleksey Sutormin.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ufa.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg's Andrey Mostovoy misses with an attempt on goal.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Ufa needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
Ufa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Saint Petersburg.
Aleksandr Yerokhin (Saint Petersburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Goal! Artem Dzyuba extends Saint Petersburg's lead to 5-0.
Magomed Ozdoev with an assist there.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Ufa throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Aleksandr Yerokhin (Saint Petersburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The match is over. Final score 6-0.
Goal! Saint Petersburg extend their lead to 6-0 through Aleksey Sutormin.
Andrey Mostovoy with an assist there.
